subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Even as Mark Teixeira was lost again with an aggravated calf strain, the Yankees routed the Orioles to once again pushed Baltimore a game behind them in the A.L. East.
snippet: Even as Mark Teixeira was lost again with an aggravated calf strain, the Yankees routed the Orioles to once again pushed Baltimore a game behind them in the A.L. East.
